parsing_result:
# Flash Settings

1. Connect the unit to the camera.

2. In shooting mode, select **FLASH FUNCTION SETTING** in the !Flash Setting Icon (FLASH SETTING) menu tab. The options available vary with the flash unit.

   !Flash Function Setting Menu

   | Menu             | Description                                                                                                                                  |
   |------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
   | BUILT-IN FLASH   | Displayed when ON is selected for !Flash Setting Icon FLASH SETTING > Built-In Flash.                                     |
   | SYNC TERMINAL    | Displayed when no compatible flash unit is connected or if the connected unit uses only the X-contact on the hot shoe.                        |
   | SHOE MOUNT FLASH | Displayed when an optional flash unit is mounted on the hot shoe and turned on.                                                              |
   | MASTER (OPTICAL) | Displayed if an optional flash unit functioning as a master flash for Fujifilm optical wireless remote flash control is connected and turned on. |

   > ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
   > SYNC TERMINAL will be displayed if OFF is selected for !Flash Setting Icon FLASH SETTING > Built-In Flash and no supported shoe-mounted flash is attached.

3. Highlight items using the focus stick (focus lever) and rotate the rear command dial to change the highlighted setting.

   !Focus Stick and Command Dial

4. Press **DISP/BACK** to put the changes into effect.
